files.help:
Add the following to the Steam arguments for Tales of Maj'Eyal 4: ```--home $XDG_DATA_HOME```
Then, move _$HOME/.t-engine_ to _$XDG_DATA_HOME/.t-engine_

**NOTE**: This flag only changes the location in which the directory is created. The actual directory itself is hardcoded as _.t-engine_, so it will still be hidden by default. There is currently no workaround for this.

Alternatively, use the Flatpak version of Steam as noted in the help for _.steam_
